games.title: Find the Frog - Hidden Objects
games.description:
Find the Frog - Hidden Objects

Explore thematic worlds: from cozy farms and mysterious swamps to bustling cities, enchanted forests, sunny beaches, pirate islands, and beyond!

Each world contains 3 levels with unique frogs to discover.

Collect all the frogs to complete your album - they're so adorable you'll want to find every single one!

‚ú® Game Features:

‚úÖ Relaxing gameplay - perfect for stress relief
‚úÖ Simple controls - suitable for all ages
‚úÖ Striking visuals - black-and-white backgrounds with colorful frogs
‚úÖ Frog collection - motivation to complete all levels
‚úÖ Varied difficulty - from beginner to expert challenges

Perfect for evening relaxation.

"Find the Frog" isn't just a game - it's a meditative journey into a hidden object world that will bring you hours of enjoyment.

üê∏ Find them all, Ribbit!
games.howToPlayText:
Search for hidden frogs across beautifully drawn black-and-white scenes! Simply tap them with your finger (on mobile) or click with your mouse (on PC) to reveal their vibrant colors. Find all frogs to complete each level, and finish entire worlds to add special location-themed frogs to your personal collection!

Stuck? Use our handy Magnifying Glass power-up! When those green tricksters hide too well, this helpful tool will reveal where they're lurking.

Good luck and happy hunting - Ribbit!

games.description: Dive into the engaging realm of Draw or Delete LoveStory, a fascinating puzzle game where you play a detective revealing a couple's secrets. Manipulate scenes by drawing or deleting elements on your phone or computer. Enjoy this thrilling adventure filled with surprises, all at no cost online.
games.howToPlayText: Look at the picture, read the task, draw or erase the element and complete the task! It's simple and very fun!

games.title: Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries
games.description:
Hidden Object: Clues and Mysteries transforms the classic hidden object genre into an engaging adventure. Immerse yourself in a world of riddles, concealed items, and unsolved enigmas.

Join an experienced detective whose calm and reassuring voice will guide you every step of the way. Search for clues in a variety of charming locations: cozy living rooms, bustling caf√©s, warm kitchens, private studies, and more.

Each scene is a unique setting where your keen eye and clever thinking will be essential to uncover all the hidden items.

Enjoy serene melodies and a cozy ambiance, as this game is designed for relaxation and leisure. Take your time to solve every mystery and feel the satisfaction of becoming a true detective.
games.howToPlayText:
In the game, you can freely move left and right across locations and zoom in to find hidden objects.
The game is available on both PC and mobile devices, allowing you to play anytime, anywhere.

games.title: Check Wednesday Phone!
games.description:
Check Wednesday Phone! creepy-cute game inspired by the Netflix series. Read messages, solve mysteries, explore Nevermore‚Äôs secrets and play gothic mini‚Äëgames.

Enter Wednesday Addams' digital world in this dark, twisted game. Check emails from Nevermore students, change your gothic phone theme, play eerie mini‚Äëgames, and explore her secret-filled dorm. Earn coins doing tasks Wednesday would probably mock ‚Äî but you‚Äôll need them to unlock the next mystery.
games.howToPlayText: Tap Wednesday‚Äôs phone to begin. Read cryptic emails, change to delightfully gloomy wallpapers, earn coins, and explore her eerie room. Click on strange objects, crack passwords, and uncover secrets hidden in Nevermore. Watch for new messages‚Äîthey guide the story.

games.title: Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House
games.description:
Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn‚Äôt take long to realize you‚Äôre not here by choice ‚Äî you‚Äôve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here‚Ä¶ and why they‚Äôve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist‚Äôs perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you‚Äôll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it‚Äôs too late. But as you progress, you‚Äôll uncover more about the girl‚Äôs twisted hobbies ‚Äî and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?
games.howToPlayText: Explore the house by tapping on objects, collect useful items, combine them to solve puzzles, and uncover secrets that lead you closer to escaping.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/escape-strange-girls-house?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
games.description:
Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge ‚Äì Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again ‚Äî and this time, she‚Äôs locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story ‚Äî and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
games.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don‚Äôt move around freely ‚Äî instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

games.title: Stick New Year in Prison
games.description:
You will play as a Stickman character. Your character ended up behind bars in a prison cell on New Year's Eve. 
Your task is to find three successful ways to escape from prison. On Christmas Day, you will be presented with ten different items in a package that can be used to escape. In the game you will face a lot of problems that you will need to solve in order to get a taste of freedom. Various locations with a New Year's Eve theme will cheer you up.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, then use a stylus or a finger.
To complete the game, you need to click on different objects and find successful ways to escape from prison.

games.title: Mike Lost In Desert - Hidden Object
games.description:
Mike Lost in Desert ‚Äì Hidden Object

After a sudden engine failure, Mike was forced to make an emergency landing in the middle of an endless desert. His plane is destroyed, his supplies are running out, and dangerous bandits are on his trail.

Wandering under the burning sun, Mike must search for useful items, explore mysterious ruins, and survive against all odds. Each discovery brings him one step closer to salvation or to his doom.

Will he find civilization before the desert claims his life, or will the bandits reach him first?

Features:
Find hidden objects in beautifully hand-painted desert locations.
Follow a story of survival and determination.
Immerse yourself in the calm but tense atmosphere of the desert.

Can you help Mike survive the unforgiving sands and find his way back to safety?
games.howToPlayText:
You have about 8 minutes to make your escape through five desert locations.
In each location, you must find 10 hidden objects before moving on to the next area.

If the time runs out, the bandits will catch you.
If you manage to find all the objects in all five locations before the time ends, you will escape the desert and survive.

Search carefully, stay focused, and move quickly. Your life depends on it.

As a new kind of search and find hidden object game, Find It Out allows you to find out all missing objects with multiple lively maps and engaging game scenes. Step inside tons of mystery locations to find all hidden objects and unlock new maps for free in this Find It and scavenger hunt puzzle game!

Search, seek, and find out in awesome graphics, you will have hundreds of hidden objects to collect for more scavenger hunt fun. If you love playing find hidden objects games, Find It or Spot It games, and other scavenger hunt puzzles, this free brain teaser will be the BEST choice for you!

games.title: Detective Max Mystery: The Disappearance of Mr. Winters
games.description:
Game description:

üîé Become a detective in a new adventure story based game! üîç

This part of Detective Max Mystery series is called ‚ÄúTHE DISAPPEARANCE OF MR.WINTERS‚Äù.

Detective Max has received a curious postcard from his neighbour, Benedict Winters. In that note he tells that he moved in a hurry and does not plan on returning. He then asks to find a small mystery box he had lost.

üîé Escape room + classic detective genre = sounds like fun! üîç


ESCAPE ROOM DETECTIVE GAMES

‚ÄîUse forensic science and the power of your grey sells
‚ÄîExamine the crime scene
‚ÄîCollect case evidence
‚ÄîIdentify the suspects, their motive and alibi
‚ÄîEscape the room by solving mind-boggling puzzles and riddles
‚ÄîEnjoy good story based detective games
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:

Where did detective Max's neighbour, Mr. Winters, go? Explore his apartment in search of evidence and the mysterious box.

üîç Point and click the areas of the screen you want to investigate.

üß© Solve puzzles by clicking and dragging objects.

üëÜUse the stuff you picked up and placed in the inventory.

–û–± –∏–≥—Ä–µ

games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings ‚Äî from cozy parks to bustling streets ‚Äî just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!

games.description:
Stranded on a deserted island... or trapped in a locked room ‚Äì what escape route will you choose?
In this escape game, you're given multiple options to break free ‚Äì but not all of them will lead to success. Some are clever, some are risky, and others... might just lead to failure.

Will you make it out? Good luck ‚Äì your escape begins now.
